arts.ttl: Scotland vs Denmark Prediction: Can Scots Reach their First Men’s World Cup Finals Since 1998?
arts.sum: After Saturday’s dramatic qualifying action in Group C, Scotland have the chance to reach their first World Cup since 1998. They just need to defeat group leaders Denmark at Hampden Park on Tuesday night to usurp the Danes and steal top spot.
